name: SoS - Save our Submarine
description:
SoS - Save our Submarine is a game where you need to decodify secrets messages about a new experimental weapon of the rival country.

Story:

● A new experimental weapon from the rival country has been built, and thanks to a spy inside the rival country, you can get information about the weapon along with attacks of that new weapon.

Guide:

● The messages is codified in morse code you need to think fast and decodify the code before intercepting the missile, or else you take damage from yours mistakes.

Controls:

A-Z : Intercept the message/missile.

Esc: Pause the game.

Credits:

Jose - Programmer

Lucas - Programmer
